includedAssets.title: A Study In Pink
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - A Study In Pink
includedAssets.synopsis: A woman in pink lies dead in a derelict house. She is the fourth in a series of seemingly impossible suicides. DI Lestrade is the best Scotland Yard has got, but even he knows that there's only one man who can help. Elsewhere in London, a war hero, invalided home from Afghanistan, meets a strange but charismatic genius who is looking for a flatmate; Dr John Watson and Sherlock Holmes are meeting for the first time.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Sherlock Holmes meets Dr Watson, and tackles the case of the Impossible Suicides.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A woman in pink lies dead in a derelict house. She is the fourth in a series of seemingly impossible suicides. DI Lestrade is the best Scotland Yard has got, but even he knows that there's only one man who can help. Elsewhere in London, a war hero, invalided home from Afghanistan, meets a strange but charismatic genius who is looking for a flatmate; Dr John Watson and Sherlock Holmes are meeting for the first time.

includedAssets.title: The Blind Banker
includedAssets.synopsis: A mysterious cipher is being scrawled on the walls around London. The first person to see the cipher is dead within hours of reading it. Sherlock plunges into a world of codes and symbols, consulting with London's best graffiti artists. He soon learns that the city is in the grip a gang of international smugglers, a secret society called the Black Lotus.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Can Sherlock and John solve the case of a mysterious and deadly cipher?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A mysterious cipher is being scrawled on the walls around London. The first person to see the cipher is dead within hours of reading it. Sherlock plunges into a world of codes and symbols, consulting with London's best graffiti artists. He soon learns that the city is in the grip a gang of international smugglers, a secret society called the Black Lotus.

includedAssets.title: The Great Game
includedAssets.synopsis: A strange clue in an empty room, a blood-soaked car, a priceless Old Master, a deranged bomber. With the clock ticking, the curtain rises on a battle of wits between Sherlock, John and the shadowy stranger who seems to know all the answers.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A battle of wits ensues between Sherlock and a stranger who seems to know all the answers.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A strange clue in an empty room, a blood-soaked car, a priceless Old Master, a deranged bomber. With the clock ticking, the curtain rises on a battle of wits between Sherlock, John and the shadowy stranger who seems to know all the answers.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Sherlock Holmes is blunt, difficult and dangerous to know. When a chance encounter brings ex-soldier and doctor John Watson into Sherlock's life, it's apparent the two men couldn't be more different, but Sherlock's intellect coupled with John's pragmatism soon forge an unbreakable alliance - one that will be tested to the limits by a mysterious criminal mastermind. International phenomenon starring Benedict Cumberbatch as the titular sleuth and Martin Freeman as his loyal flatmate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A chance encounter brings John Watson into the life of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes. Global phenomenon with Benedict Cumberbatch and Martin Freeman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Sherlock Holmes is blunt, difficult and dangerous to know. When a chance encounter brings ex-soldier and doctor John Watson into Sherlock's life, it's apparent the two men couldn't be more different, but Sherlock's intellect coupled with John's pragmatism soon forge an unbreakable alliance - one that will be tested to the limits by a mysterious criminal mastermind. International phenomenon starring Benedict Cumberbatch as the titular sleuth and Martin Freeman as his loyal flatmate.

includedIn.title: Sherlock
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A chance encounter brings Afghanistan veteran John Watson into the unique world of genius sleuth Sherlock Holmes.
